ca.ualberta.cs.corgFuControllers

Class QAController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.corgFuControllers.QAController

  • public class QAController
extends java.lang.Object
    The controller that allows for modification of the question model, which also includes the modification of the answer models. Upvotes, replies, and pictures can also be modified throught the QAController.
    Author:
    wrflemin
    See Also:
    Answer, Reply, Picture

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      QAController(Question q)
      Builds the controller with the question model that it will be modifying.
